name: Princess' Escape!
description:
A young princess sits alone in her room, bored to tears from the confinement of her noble status.

When suddenly, she hears a loud explosion and people panicking. She peers from her window, only to see her castle being under siege by the evil wizard's orcish army!
At that point, she could only think one thing "Finally, a chance to escape!"

Princess' Escape is a simple endless runner I made half a year ago to combat my final exam induced stress.

Sounds effect used:
https://opengameart.org/content/512-sound-effects-8-bit-style
Music used:
https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Rolemusic/Straw_Fields/02_rolemusic_-_leafles...
https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Rolemusic/The_Black_Dot/09_rolemusic_-_the_li...
